metadata.description: Stretching app powered by AI. By Pol Thomas & Alessio Pelliccione.
metadata.title: Routines

newRoutine.title: New Routine
newRoutine.description: Help us build a routine tailored to your body
newRoutine.invitationText: Tell us about your sensations, mobility, physical comfort, and the areas you'd like to improve in your daily life.
newRoutine.placeholder: e.g. tight hips, limited shoulder mobility, feeling stiff after work, recovery after workouts...
newRoutine.introText: Your personalized routine, tailored to your request.
newRoutine.exploreExercisesText: Tap on any exercise to see its characteristics
newRoutine.refinePlaceholder: e.g. less intensity on shoulders, add more core exercises...

installPrompt.title: Install the Routines app for a better experience

instructions.title: Installation instructions
instructions.intro: Look for buttons in your browser, not in the app.
instructions.other: Look for « Install » or « Add to home screen » option in the browser menu.

offline.message: You are offline. Some features may be limited.
offline.pageMessage: This page is not available offline.
offline.pageInstruction: Check your internet connection and try again.
